contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> Name = Organic| Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Freak Kitchen]] | Cover = FreakKitchenOrganic.jpg | Released = April 27, 2005 | Recorded = August - December, 2004 | Genre = [[Heavy metal music|Heavy Metal]], [[hard rock|Hard Rock]], [[progressive metal|Progressive Metal]] | Length = 46:11 | Label = [[Replica Records]]/[[Thunderstruck Productions]]/[[JVC]] Victor | Producer = Mattias "IA" Eklundh| Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Move (Freak Kitchen album)|Move]]''<br />(2002) | This album = '''''Organic'''''<br /> (2005) | Next album = ''[[Land of the Freaks]]''<br/>(2009) |}} '''''Organic''''' is the sixth full length studio album [[CD]] by [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]], [[hard rock]], [[progressive metal]] band [[Freak Kitchen]]. It was released on 27 April 2005, globally, through Thunderstruck Productions. The album includes collaboration with American musician [[Bumblefoot]], who plays guitar and sings on ''Speak When Spoken To''. [[Christer Örtefors]] handles the lead vocals on the track Infidelity Ghost. Organic's first printing featured a bonus [[DVD]], which contains exclusive live videos and video clips. ==Track listing== #"Speak When Spoken To" – 3:06 #"The Rights To You" – 4:00 #"Look Bored" – 3:42 #"Chest Pain Waltz" – 4:20 #"Mussolini Mind" – 3:42 #"Guilt Trip" – 3:38 #"Becky" – 4:00 #"Independent Way Of Life" – 4:00 #"Heal Me" – 4:11 #"Infidelity Ghost" – 4:20 #"Sob Story" – 3:57 #"Breathe" – 3:10 Bonus [[DVD]]: #Speak When Spoken To #Blind (Live at Montpellier) #Nobody's Laughing #Hateful Little People (Live at Paris) #Print This! #Taste My Chopstick (Live at Paris) ==Personnel== [[Freak Kitchen]]: *[[Mattias Eklundh|Mattias "IA" Eklundh]] – [[Singing|vocals]] and [[Guitar]] *[[Christer Örtefors]] – [[Bass guitar]] and [[Singing|vocals]] *[[Björn Fryklund]] – [[Drum kit|drums]] Guest appearance: *[[Ronald Thal]] A.K.A. Bumblefoot - [[Singing|vocals]] and [[Guitar]] on ''Speak When Spoken To'' {{DEFAULTSORT:Organic (Album)}} [[Category:2005 albums]] [[Category:Freak Kitchen albums]]
